rules_text: [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains vigilance and protection from the color of your choice.
special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains vigilance and protection from the color of your choice.
[-1]: Tap up to three target creatures.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance, first strike, and lifelink.”
